name: Open Source Shrine
description:
Created for A Game by Its Cover 2020.  Make an offering to the gods and they will respond in kind.

Directly inspired by "Open Source Shrine" by Bob Leduc-Reasoner, created for My Famicase Exhibition 2020.  His original description:

"Need a quick source of spiritual vitality?  Need to pray for good fortune?  Load up this digital shrine and pay a visit to the local kami inside the cartridge.  Every visit is a surprise as no two visits are ever the same."

Thanks for his permission to use his idea, words, and cart image.  Other credits are in the game.
